Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Call A. Classification as in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil' Humid forest. Natural calls of bird seen perched in bush beside stream. Probably Such's Antthrush which had sung close by, whereas Short-tailed Antthrush was not heard at all during this visit to Boa Nova. This is Call A in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
